meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Megan Williams Clint Thompson Nathan Flynn Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7564.

td.p: Megan Williams, a chief of operations from Brooklyn, New York
Clint Thompson, a project manager from Putnam, Connecticut
Nathan Flynn, an English teacher from Royal Oak, Michigan (whose 1-day cash winnings total $18,001)

tr.td: INVERTEBRATES
"N" THE MAP
SPORTS
ADD A LETTER
LYRE, LYRE
PANTS ON FIRE

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', '(Clint: What\'s a hydra jellyfish?)

Medusa

ClintMegan
')
